sourcesContent:
export default function Characters(props) { const { characters } = props; return (

Personajes

Volver a la home
{characters.map((character, index) => (

{character.name}

{character.status === "Alive" ? ( <> Vivo ) : ( <> Muerto )}

Episodios: {character.episode.length}

Especie: {character.species}

))}
Volver al inicio
); }
